companies.name: GRACIA AI
companies.description: Gracia AI specializes in producing completely photorealistic volumetric videos for XR, leveraging Gaussian splatting technology. This allows users to walk around the video and view it from any angle, offering an immersive sense of presence. The technology is the best fit for capturing human performances to improve learning skills in XR. Gracia serves as a one-stop shop for professional creators, providing the necessary technology and integrations to produce and deliver this new type of content.
companies.categories: Artifical Intelligence (AI), Augmented Reality-Software and Services, Education/Training, Immersive System, Medical Application, Rendering & Modeling, Virtual Reality Software/Hardware
